entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low zero. Forecast issued 6:51 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers. High 12.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain changing to rain showers in the morning. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the morning and in the afternoon. Local rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 in the afternoon. High 12. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:51 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low 8 with temperature rising to 13 by morning.
entry.summary: Showers. Risk of a thunderstorm in the evening and after midnight. Local amount 5 to 10 mm. Low 8 with temperature rising to 13 by morning. Forecast issued 6:51 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
